comment.author: 16474527@N08
comment._content: Bostock and Wombwell's Menagerie building up for the last time on the cattle market at Newcastle on Tyne, November 1931. The show was auctioned on 30th November, and sold off in separate lots.

comment.author: 29295370@N07
comment._content:
@kevn.scrivens

All of your comments on these fairground images have been very useful. Thanks so much for sharing this information with us.
